archimate:BusinessFunction.name: Netcomponent in levenscyclusbeheer opnemen
archimate:BusinessFunction.documentation: Het vermogen om aanpassingen op assets in de assetregistraties te borgen gedurende de gehele levenscyclus van de assets.

properties.value: Include grid component in lifecycle management
The ability to safeguard adjustments to assets in the asset registrations during the entire life cycle of the assets.
